channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Cruise ship rescues 4 from disabled catamaran hundreds of miles off Bermuda, officials say
item.description: Officials say a cruise ship rescued four people from a disabled catamaran taking on water hundreds of miles off the coast of Bermuda. U.S.

item.title: Engines on 1.4 million Honda vehicles might fail, so US regulators open an investigation
item.description: U.S. auto safety regulators are investigating complaints that engines can fail on as many as 1.4 million Honda and Acura vehicles.

item.title: Research reveals China has built prototype nuclear reactor to power aircraft carrier
item.description: U.S. researchers have concluded that China has built a land-based prototype nuclear reactor to power future aircraft carriers.
